plants.name: Ashwagandha
plants.description: Ashwagandha, the 'Indian Ginseng,' is a revered adaptogen from India, North Africa and the Middle East. Its root has been used for millennia to combat stress, bolster the immune system, and promote restful sleep.

plants.name: Turmeric
plants.description: Turmeric is a vibrant rhizome native to India and Southeast Asia. This spice isn't just for curries; its active compound, curcumin, boasts potent anti-inflammatory and antioxidant properties.
